"Donny Don Kirshner would take a kid off the street, bring him up to his office in the Brill Building and turn him into Neil Diamond , Carole King , James Taylor , on and on," Jack Wishna said. I haven't spoken to anyone in the music business that Donny hasn't either discovered, promoted, or touched in some way.
